EmailTemplate.subject: This. Is. Big. 5 X The Points!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/product/99115-JR_Grand__Toy_Premium_Copy_Paper_White_Letter-Size_8_12_x_11_SFI_Certified_20_lb_5_ReamsCT.aspx?cmp=EBGRPAPERBONUSOCTOBER20192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/product/99115-JR_Grand__Toy_Premium_Copy_Paper_White_Letter-Size_8_12_x_11_SFI_Certified_20_lb_5_ReamsCT.aspx?cmp=EBGRPAPERBONUSOCTOBER20192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy Premium Copy Paper,
White, Letter-Size (8 1/2” x 11”),
SFI Certified, 20 lb., 5 Reams/CT
SKU #: 99115-JR
$22.99/CT Premium Points On Premium Paper! This month only, get an exclusive 5 X the points on our best-selling paper – that’s the equivalent of $5 towards your next purchase, for every unit you buy. Sign In To Save <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/product/99115-JR_Grand__Toy_Premium_Copy_Paper_White_Letter-Size_8_12_x_11_SFI_Certified_20_lb_5_ReamsCT.aspx?cmp=EBGRPAPERBONUSOCTOBER20192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
** 5X the Bonus points calculated based on 5% of 99115-JR regular price ($22.99). You will earn $5 worth of Grand Rewards points at the time of purchase for 99115-JR from October 1-31, 2019. Please allow up to 30 days for the $5 of bonus points to be added to your account. To check your current Grand Rewards points balance, please sign in to your account. Offer subject to change without notice.
